name: Neraj Pandya
title: Head of Product Management at Yodel
quote: The team's professionalism, dedication, and collaborative spirit make them a pleasure to work with. They've become more than a supplier: they're a trusted partner whose contributions have been pivotal to our success in delivering superior digital experiences.

name: Mark Gibbard
title: CTO at Tuskerdirect
quote: Since 2020, 100Starlings has contributed to all major Ruby on Rails developments at Tusker. They have played a crucial role in launching new brands and products, and have been key contributors to our ongoing microservices architecture initiative.

name: Taylor Williams
title: CTO at Learn Amp
quote: Their solutions are practical, scalable, and tailored to our business needs. They are our preferred partner for complex architectural challenges, and I highly recommend 100Starlings for any organisation seeking a dedicated and highly skilled development partner.
